description:
Franz von Mariendorf was a member of the nobility, best known for helping to implement major reforms and being the first Minister of State of the Goldenlöwe Dynasty, as well as being the father of the empress and regent of the Goldenlöwe Dynasty, http://anidb.net/ch199 [Hildegard von Lohengramm].
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Franz von Mariendorf
